item.title: Edgar Berlanga Scores Brutal KO Win In Fight He Never Wanted To Have
item.description: Edgar Berlanga destroyed Jonathan Gonzalez-Ortiz on Saturday night in Orlando in an onslaught. Berlanga didn’t even want the fight.
